description:
Finally we can write native mobile apps for multiple platforms in our favorite language! React Native is a framework developed by Facebook for building native mobile apps using JavaScript and React which makes it a natural fit for ClojureScript. In this talk I will go through:

- The basics of how React Native works
- How to set it up to work with ClojureScript
- The synergies of ClojureScript and Redux in React Native
- Pros and cons compared to classic native app development

Slides: https://speakerdeck.com/vikeri/clojurescript-and-react-native
title: Native mobile apps with ClojureScript
